title: "Perceptron: AI halts traffic, stabilises gaits, and saves whales"
excerpt: "An AI system listens for the calls of certain species and reports back to a researcher, who can then determine where the animal or animals are by correlating the data with factors like water temperature and weather as well as historical records of whale sightings in the area."
